name: Campbell's® Easy Chicken and Cheese Enchiladas
author: Campbell's Kitchen
summary: A creamy filling of chicken, sour cream, and cheese gets an added kick stirred into it with Pace® Picante Sauce. Rolled up in tortillas and baked until bubbly, these enchiladas couldn't be easier, or any more delicious.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or Healthy Request®)
½ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Stir the soup, sour cream, picante sauce and chili powder in a medium bowl
Stir 1 cup picante sauce mixture, chicken and cheese in a large bowl
Divide the chicken mixture among the tortillas
Roll up the tortillas and place them seam side up in 11 x 8" shallow baking dish
Pour the remaining picante sauce mixture over the filled tortillas
or until the enchiladas are hot and bubbling
Top with the tomato and onion
